.
~foo\~
.
<p>~foo~</p>
.

.
~foo bar~
.
<p>~foo bar~</p>
.

.
_foo\ bar\ baz_
.
<p><em>foo bar baz</em></p>
.

.
*foo\ bar\ baz*
.
<p><strong>foo bar baz</strong></p>
.

.
~foo\ bar\ baz~
.
<p><strike>foo bar baz</strike></p>
.

.
~\ foo\ ~
.
<p><strike> foo </strike></p>
.

.
~foo\\\\\\\ bar~
.
<p><strike>foo\\\ bar</strike></p>
.

.
~foo\\\\\\ bar~
.
<p>~foo\\\ bar~</p>
.

.
*~foo~\ bar*
.
<p><strong>~foo~ bar</strong></p>
.


coverage
.
*~f
.
<p>*~f</p>
.
